0.1.name: wordpress/wp-email-guard
0.1.description:
WP Email Guard protects your email addresses included on any post or page from being crawled by spammers.

It converts every email written within your post body into a JavaScript code, so the emails is readable and can be clicked by humans only.

Spammers can't crawl JavaScript.
